/opt/rh/devtoolset-1.1/root/usr/bin/c++    -Wall -Wno-unused-function -Wno-unused-parameter -Wextra -std=c++11 -Wno-dollar-in-identifier-extension -O3 -DNDEBUG    CMakeFiles/DeviceQuery_Solution.dir/Module2/DeviceQuery/./DeviceQuery_Solution_generated_template.cu.o  -o DeviceQuery_Solution -rdynamic /uaopt/cuda/7.0.28/lib64/libcudart.so libwb.a -lpthread -lm -lrt /uaopt/cuda/7.0.28/lib64/libcudart.so -Wl,-rpath,/uaopt/cuda/7.0.28/lib64
